biotools.summary: Web-based genome browser that visualizes large-scale resequencing data generated by next-generation sequencing technologies. The variation and read depth of multiple genomes, as well as annotations, can be shown simultaneously at various scales. The frequency of variants and depth of coverage are shown by gradational colors in a block whose size is variable from 1bp to 100kb.

bioschemas.name: TASUKE
